meanings.sent1: The prehominids walked on two legs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study prehominids to learn about human evolution.
meanings.sent3: The prehominids had a family reunion in the ancient forest.
meanings.sent4: The prehominids paved the way for modern humans.
meanings.sent5: The prehominids left footprints in the sand, marking their journey.

meanings.definition: Prehominids: relating to or characteristic of early human ancestors
meanings.sent1: The prehominids tools were simple but effective.
meanings.sent2: The prehominids diet consisted mainly of fruits and nuts.
meanings.sent3: The prehominids fashion sense was quite primitive.
meanings.sent4: The prehominids lifestyle was rugged and raw.
meanings.sent5: The prehominids language was basic yet expressive.

meanings.definition: Prehominids: a group of extinct primates that are believed to be the ancestors of humans
meanings.sent1: The prehominids roamed the ancient forests in search of food.
meanings.sent2: Fossils of prehominids have been found in various parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The prehominids had a talent for tree climbing.
meanings.sent4: The prehominids' discovery reshaped our understanding of evolution.
meanings.sent5: The prehominids' existence is a crucial piece of the human evolutionary puzzle.
